header.text: Web Developer: Laravel, VueJS, NodeJS, Steam API, Steam Bot Cluster

csgoeffect.title: CSGOEffect.ru
csgoeffect.text: CSGOEffect was developed using Laravel, NodeJS, Socket.IO and steam API for the customer. This project includes on-fly data updates, working with old, badly-working steam API, lots of business logic and lot's of other things.

coursework.title: Course work
coursework.text: Course work is a project that I built using Laravel and jQuery for my school's curse work. This is extremely easy and common project that was done in a half of the day. But it still has a good code that I can show to you.

steamaccountcreator.title: Steam account creator
steamaccountcreator.text: Steam account creator is nodeJS script that generates, creates, validates and saves steam account from nothing. The only thing you need to do is: run the script and enter the phone number you'd like to attach. This project was built for the purpose of getting reputation by a request of some stranger.
